universal_guidelines: Use 'Manrope' for all headings to establish a modern, friendly authority.
Use 'Inter' for all body text for maximum legibility.
Primary action buttons must always be Slate-900 (Black/Dark Blue) to convey seriousness.
Secondary actions (like 'Cancel' or 'Back') should be outlined or ghost buttons.
Use the 'Ticket' metaphor for listings: Origin on left, Destination on right, connected by an arrow.
Always show a 'Verification Badge' next to user names if they are verified.
Forms must be split into multi-step wizards to reduce cognitive load (e.g., Step 1: ID, Step 2: Job, Step 3: Contact).
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state that includes a slight color shift or lift.
Do not use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A) instead.
Mobile navigation bar is mandatory for mobile views.
All inputs must have clear labels and helper text where necessary.
Use 'Skeleton' loaders for data fetching states.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the 'Becayiş' platform. Follow these guidelines strictly. Start by setting up the global font and color variables in your CSS/Tailwind config. Then build the layout components (Navbar, Footer, Sidebar). Then proceed to the pages. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and placeholders. Ensure the 'One Account' policy is visually reinforced (e.g., 'Verified ID' icons). Use Shadcn components but style them according to the 'components' section above.
